attributes.action: Ensure the Transfer of a cherished number plate takes no longer than 3 working days
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Local DVLA offices are taking too long to process a cherished transfer of a number plate. This causes lost sales and undue frustration of customer as well as frustration of people in the Motor Trade . The local DVLA office will not speak to the Motor Trade. When a customer enquires with DVLA Swansea they are told they can process within 3 days. However from Start to finish the process can take between 3 and 6 weeks once the local DVLA offices process the paperwork. Why should this happen in the modern age of computers? Revenue is being lost by the Government the Motor Trade.The General Public are being disadanatged buying another car, should they have a cherished number plate they wish to transfer.
